price: AKASEMA: Je! Sikukwambia kwamba hakika wewe huwezi kuvumilia kuwa pamoja nami?
arabic: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا
footnotes: Mja mwema akamwambia Musa: Mimi nalikwambia kwamba wewe hutaweza kustahamili ukanyamaza kimya usiniulize.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
